snippet: The account was created by Ian Schafer five minutes or so after Clint Eastwood ended his speech to the Republican National Convention, with a chair as a stand-in for President Obama; it now has nearly 70,000 followers.
abstract: The account was created by Ian Schafer five minutes or so after Clint Eastwood ended his speech to the Republican National Convention, with a chair as a stand-in for President Obama; it now has nearly 70,000 followers.

headline.main: @InvisibleObama Was Quick Twitter Thinking by Digital Ad Executive
